item.title: Report E-2024100020
item.description:
Report E-2024100020

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-03T09:21:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-20
  • City: ALICEVILLE
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On September 20, 2024, two (2) 5-gallon pails of UN3469 were damaged in transit and released approximately four (4) gallons of product to the trailer interior and concrete below. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Alpha-Omega Training and Compliance, Inc. (AOTC) to remediate the impacted site. AOTC personnel deployed granular absorbents to the impacted areas and worked them in with hand tools. All UN3469 impacted surfaces were wiped down with absorbent pads. All spent absorbents, pads, and the damaged pails, were collected and containerized into two (2) 55-gallon drums for transport and disposal.
